content.text: Match ends, Real Madrid 2, Barcelona 0.
Second Half ends, Real Madrid 2, Barcelona 0.
Javier Mascherano (Barcelona) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Casemiro (Real Madrid) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Javier Mascherano (Barcelona).
Offside, Real Madrid. Marcelo tries a through ball, but Karim Benzema is caught offside.
Foul by Sergio Ramos (Real Madrid).
Luis Suárez (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Marcelo (Real Madrid) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left misses to the left. Assisted by Lucas Vázquez with a cross.
Luis Suárez (Barcelona) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Luis Suárez (Barcelona).
Casemiro (Real Madrid) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Casemiro (Real Madrid).
Sergi Roberto (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt saved. Sergio Ramos (Real Madrid) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Dani Ceballos with a cross.
Corner,  Real Madrid. Conceded by Nélson Semedo.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Sergio Ramos.
Attempt blocked. Gerard Deulofeu (Barcelona) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Luis Suárez.
Attempt missed. Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) right footed shot from the left side of the box is too high. Assisted by Luka Modric with a cross following a corner.
Substitution, Real Madrid. Dani Ceballos replaces Toni Kroos.
Corner,  Real Madrid. Conceded by Lucas Digne.
Substitution, Barcelona. Lucas Digne replaces Jordi Alba.
Offside, Barcelona. Lionel Messi tries a through ball, but Luis Suárez is caught offside.
Substitution, Real Madrid. Theo Hernández replaces Marco Asensio.
Attempt missed. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Gerard Deulofeu.

Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Sergio Ramos.
Attempt blocked. Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked.
Substitution, Barcelona. Gerard Deulofeu replaces André Gomes.
Luis Suárez (Barcelona) hits the right post with a header from the centre of the box.
Attempt saved. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Ivan Rakitic.
Attempt saved. Sergi Roberto (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Luis Suárez with a through ball.
Casemiro (Real Madrid) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Sergi Roberto (Barcelona).
Offside, Real Madrid. Keylor Navas tries a through ball, but Lucas Vázquez is caught offside.

Second Half begins Real Madrid 2, Barcelona 0.
First Half ends, Real Madrid 2, Barcelona 0.
Attempt missed. Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) left footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Lucas Vázquez.
